title: After 35 years in a professional career, I have an opportunity to start working in a completely different field that I have enjoyed as a hobby for over 40 years. How do I show my hobby related experiences on a CV or resume? - Quora

response.answer_text: Google sample resumes in your ‘new’ career (40-year hobby). Take inventory of marketable and transferable skills, then compare it to your resume in your 35-year career. Once you are satisfied, give it a test run.
Congratulations! Should be the same — chronological order — you can explain the transition on a cover letter, from a special interest to a new position.
